dct_title_s: Carte particulière des costes de l'Afrique qui comprend le Royaume de Cacheo, le province de Gelofo, &c. : levée par ordre expres des roys de Portugal, sans qui on en a fait la découverte
dct_description_sm: Scale approximately 1:1,200,000 ; Map oriented with north to the left ; Inset: birds-eye view of l'Isle de Gorée ; Map and view include compass roses ; 'Avec privilège de nos seigneurs les états de Holl. et de Westfrise.' ; Most likely detached from the third volume of Mortier's edition of Le Neptune françois, or Suite du Neptune françois ; Covers west coast of Africa from modern northern Senegal to southern Guinea ; Place names in French and Portuguese ; Amsterdam : chez Pierre Mortier
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
